info.name: svhn_classification
info.description:
A module for classifying the SVHN (Street View House Number) dataset
using an eigenbasis

inputs.name: svhn_test
inputs.description: the path of the tar.gz file containing all test images for the SVHN dataset and the file "digitStruct.mat".

inputs.name: mnist_train_images
inputs.description: the path of the training images for the MNIST dataset

inputs.name: mnist_train_labels
inputs.description: the path of the training labels for the MNIST dataset

inputs.name: mnist_test_images
inputs.description: the path of the test images for the MNIST dataset

inputs.name: mnist_test_labels
inputs.description: the path of the test labels for the MNIST dataset

outputs.name: error_rate_file
outputs.description: the JSON file that will hold the error rates computed for the MNIST test set and the SVHN test set

parameters.name: num_PCA
parameters.description: Number of principle component used to classify image
